Whenever Corrupt Congressman enters or attacks, make a pledge. [i](Create any black Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate one of its Pledges without paying its cost.)[/i]
Cliques you control have “Pledge – {4}: Each opponent loses 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifice a creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”
